overview: As former model Chantel daydreams back to her blissful times as a newlywed, her husband Keith is leading a fantasy life of his own. While she remembers being Keith's beloved muse, posing elegantly for glamorous photos, his gaze has shifted to a new model, Tiffany. So, when Chantel shows up early to her hubby's photography studio, she's in for quite a nasty shock when she spies Keith and Tiffany together.  Keith's assistant, Nina, leads the shocked Chantel away and takes her on a journey of sexual reawakening in which she discovers her dominant side.
title: The Black Corset
